doc.title: Penelope's Fashion Show
doc.plot: This is a promotional short for the feature film _Penelope (1966)_ (qv). Costume designer 'Edith Head' (qv) reads from a book on psychology and explains that it all boils down to one thing: a woman simply has to have the right outfit to wear at all times. Star 'Natalie Wood (I)' (qv) poses for test shots with several of the ensembles that Miss Head has designed for the film. We then see a clip from the bank-robbing scene in the movie.
